headline: Molson Coors to Cut 9% of Americas Workforce
summary: Molson Coors will eliminate about 400 salaried positions, or 9%, from its Americas business. The restructuring will allow the maker of Miller Lite and Blue Moon to focus on growth areas and invest in new products, the company said Monday.

raw.headline: Molson Coors to Cut 9% of Americas Workforce
raw.summary: Molson Coors will eliminate about 400 salaried positions, or 9%, from its Americas business. The restructuring will allow the maker of Miller Lite and Blue Moon to focus on growth areas and invest in new products, the company said Monday.

headline: Molson Coors to Cut 9% of Americas Workforce in Restructuring
summary: Molson Coors said it will eliminate around 400 salaried positions across its Americas business, representing about 9% of the unit’s workforce.

raw.headline: Molson Coors to Cut 9% of Americas Workforce in Restructuring
raw.summary: Molson Coors said it will eliminate around 400 salaried positions across its Americas business, representing about 9% of the unit’s workforce.

headline: Molson Coors Beverage Company Announces Corporate Restructuring of Americas Business Unit
summary: CHICAGO, October 20, 2025--Molson Coors Beverage Company ("Molson Coors" or "the company") (NYSE: TAP, TAP.A) today announced a corporate restructuring plan, designed to create a leaner, more agile Americas organization while advancing its ability to reinvest in the business and position the company for future growth.

raw.headline: Molson Coors Beverage Company Announces Corporate Restructuring of Americas Business Unit
raw.summary: CHICAGO, October 20, 2025--Molson Coors Beverage Company ("Molson Coors" or "the company") (NYSE: TAP, TAP.A) today announced a corporate restructuring plan, designed to create a leaner, more agile Americas organization while advancing its ability to reinvest in the business and position the company for future growth.
